concept.title: Sample files
concept.shortdesc: This chapter contains information about the DITA sample source files that come with DITA Open Toolkit.

conbody.p: The sample files (garage and grocery shopping) described in this chapter are part of the package accompanying this document. Ant scripts are also included.
The garage sample is featured in the processing instructions in the processing chapter of this document (
The grocery shopping sample is featured in the creating topics and maps chapters of this document ( and ).
